title: Govt borrowing results in decrease in investment

content.prompt: Increases in government borrowing to finance increases in budget deficits will most likely result in

choices.label: a decrease in the real interest rate
a decrease in private domestic investment
a rightward shift in the long-run Phillips curve
an increase in the money supply
an increase in financial capital outflows

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
